column4: hello. how can I, from the command line, tell Ubuntu Feisty to use Metacity instead of Beryl next time I reboot? Thanks in advance for your time
can't you run metacity from another terminal? (ctrl+alt+F1 for example)
so my wireless problem has nothing to do with my inexperienced clicking in xconfig?
I'll try, I'll be back in a bit. Thx
